snippet: A hundred years after the ship left Southampton, the port city marked the anniversary of the epic disaster with a recording of the ship’s whistle.
abstract: Large crowds gather along the docks of Southampton, England, to commemorate the centennial of the Titanic's maiden voyage; many among the crowd are relatives of of the ship's 685 crew members who hailed from Southampton.
lead_paragraph: A hundred years after the ship left Southampton, the port city marked the anniversary of the epic disaster with a recording of the ship’s whistle.

headline.main: Where Trip Began, Remembering Titanic’s Lost
headline.print_headline: Recalling Titanic’s Lost Where Trip Began
